meta.title: Prana Air Nano TVOC Monitor (Odor), HCHO | Portable, Accurate
meta.description: Monitor real-time air quality on the go with Prana Air Nano TVOC (odor) & HCHO monitor, portable & low-cost for healthier living.

item1.heading: Accurate · Compact · Reliable
item1.paragraph: Experience the convenience of this sleek and compact TVOC monitoring device, which eliminates the need for bulky and complex equipment. With its reliable data on indoor air quality you can stay informed and take control of your environment effortlessly.
item1.alt: prana air nano odor tvoc monitor with real-time data

item2.heading: Versatile · Convenient · Sleek
item2.paragraph: Experience the ultimate in practicality and versatility with our sleek and convenient TVOC pocket monitor. From tracking indoor air quality to adapting to different air quality environments its the must-have device for effortless monitoring wherever you go.
item2.alt: prana air nano odor tvoc monitor with real-time data

productInfo.title: Nano TVOC & HCHO
productInfo.subtitle: Odor Monitor
productInfo.description: Prana Air Nano TVOC & HCHO monitor is a handy air quality monitoring device that helps you monitor Total Volatile Organic Compounds & Formaldehyde levels in real-time along temperature and humidity.
productInfo.extraContent: Monitor odor in real-time with an advanced and innovative cutting edge technology.

monitoringBanner.title: Monitoring
monitoringBanner.subtitle: has never been this easy!
monitoringBanner.description: Prana Air nano TVOC/HCHO monitor possesses an elegant and attractive design, facilitating effortless portability even during extensive travels.
monitoringBanner.personImg: Person wearing backpack with Prana Air nano TVOC monitor
monitoringBanner.deviceImg: Prana Air nano TVOC monitor closeup

features.title: Outstanding features of the Monitor
features.description: It has a small, compact body with a minimal and attractive style that seamlessly blends aesthetics and technology to create a product thats both beautiful and practical.

ultraHD.title: Ultra HD
ultraHD.subtitle: 1.9 Vibrant Color Screen With Unparalleled Ultra High Definition
ultraHD.description: High-precision sensors for real-time gas concentration monitoring on a vivid color display, with a user-friendly interface for easy reading and interpretation.

altTexts.handy: prana air nano tvoc monitor is handy
altTexts.portable: prana air odor tvoc monitor is portable

compact.title: Compact
compact.description: Prana Air nano TVOC/ HCHO monitor is an incredibly handy device features a user-friendly interface that allows for hassle-free reading and interpretation of results.

convenient.title: Convenient
convenient.description: This device allows for convenient and hassle-free reading and interpretation of results, and its compact design makes it incredibly easy to carry around wherever you go.

tvocDangers.title: TVOC and Formaldehyde Dangers
tvocDangers.description: Monitoring TVOC and formaldehyde in the respiratory environment is important as exposures can cause dizziness, respiratory disorders, skin problems, endocrine system disorders, dermatitis, headache, and even cancer.

severe.effect: Brain damage, coma, or even death

realTimeData.subtitle: Real-Time Data
realTimeData.title: TVOC, HCHO, Temp., & Humidity
realTimeData.description: Prana Air TVOC/HCHO monitor utilizes advanced MOS monitoring technology to provide real-time data and insights on indoor odor levels. This cutting-edge device empowers you to take control of your environment and making informed decisions to reduce odor and promote clean air.

altTexts.washroom: measuring indoor tvoc level with prana air monitor

mosTechnology.title: MOS- Metal Oxide Semiconductor
mosTechnology.subtitle: For TVOC & HCHO Detection
mosTechnology.description: When TVOC & HCHO gases come in contact with the metal oxide surface, they change the resistance of the semiconductor material, causing a measurable change in the electrical current passing through it. This change is then recorded by the device and interpreted as a gas concentration level, providing real-time data on indoor air quality.

smartChip.subtitle: for more Accurate Detection
smartChip.description: The instrument has a built-in high-performance smart chip that detects TVOC and formaldehyde levels, ensuring more accurate measurements.

productComparison.title: Comparison of Our Nano TVOC/HCHO monitor vs a high-end monitor

questions.question: 1. What gases can this nano monitor of Prana Air detect?
questions.answer: This nano monitor is designed to detect TVOC and HCHO gases.

questions.question: 2. Can this nano monitor detect gases other than TVOC and HCHO?
questions.answer: No, this device is specifically designed to detect TVOC and HCHO gases only.

questions.question: 3. Can Prana Air nano TVOC/HCHO monitor measure temperature and humidity levels?
questions.answer: Yes, this device also measures temperature and humidity levels in addition to TVOC and HCHO gases.

questions.question: 4. How accurate is this nano TVOC/HCHO monitor?
questions.answer: The device is equipped with high-precision sensors that provide accurate and reliable data (±5%).

questions.question: 5. Is this nano monitor easy to use?
questions.answer: Yes, the device is designed to be user-friendly and easy to operate.

questions.question: 6. Is Prana Air nano monitor portable?
questions.answer: Yes, the device is small and compact, making it easy to carry around wherever you go.

questions.question: 7. Does this monitor have alarm system?
questions.answer: Yes, it gives an alarm sound when the TVOCs value is yellow color 0.100mg/m³. It will start a beep cycle alarm, once every 10 minutes.
